page.title: 17ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN.
page.content: Children in Cuffley are well catered for with clubs and groups meeting every evening. Cubs, Brownies, Guides and Scouts meet weekly and all organise a variety of camping holidays during school vacations. There are several youth clubs which meet either in the Youth Centre or the Church Halls. Here, discos, judo, snooker, pool, ballet, table-tennis and other amusements are arranged.The Tennis Club have a very well organised Junior Section and a Tournament is held annually. The adult Drama Group also have a junior section which meets weekly. There are a variety of activities and competitions organised by the librarian and the children are encouraged to use the local library which is in Maynards Place.Football teams are run for boys of seven and older on Saturday mornings.
